name: Friendship (Alpha)
description:
Friendship is a First person , suspense, story-telling game. You play as Chris, a conflicted person who's suffering from anxiety. The game begins when you enter to an old factory where it will take place a birthday party that your friends organiced for you, but you start to realice that not everything it's what it seems.

Main goal (In this stage):

Explore the map and find some of the messages that your friends left for you. Don't let the anxiety gets you.

Controls: Movement

W - Fordward
A - Left
D - Right
S - Backward

Left Shift - Sprint

Interaction

E - Take objects
Q - Swap objects
Space bar - Reload battery
Mouse - Move Camera
Doble right click - Flashlight On

Note:

This game is in Alpha stage, a few mechanics, story and 3D assets are still missing.
This version only shows the main mechanics of Friendship.

Developed by:

Pedro Martínez Rubio (The LopLop).
